home.heroText: Crodal is a Software design and development company headquartered in Bangalore.

curatedPartnerships.description: Crodal curates its partnerships with developers worldwide to showcase some of the newest and most brilliant ideas in gaming that combine experimental game design with unique art direction.

introText: We are an AI-native software company that builds intelligent products alongside founders. Crodal partners through a co-creation model—working closely with leadership teams, sharing ownership, and shaping strategy—while preserving creative and technical independence. Together, we design, build, and scale AI-driven software that is both impactful and commercially successful.

We spent a lot of time thinking about what our values as a company are. They inform every decision we make and we wanted to ensure we got them right. We're always changing but these ideas are foundational to who we are.

values.title: Curiosity, creativity and intellectual agility
values.description: Original thinking and collaboration are at the core of the organization. Strong voices and unique ideas are valued in everything we do.

values.title: Savoir Faire
values.description: We celebrate people who take pride in their craft, giving them the space to improve, the resources to flourish, and opportunities to share their expertise.

values.title: Supporting and elevating each other
values.description: We nurture a vibrant, inclusive community where people feel safe, respected and empowered.

about.careersLink: If any of this sounds like something you'd like to be a part of, we'd love to hear from you! Check out our vacancies over on our careers portal →

pitch.title: Inbound Form.
pitch.introText: We understand that pitching can be challenging. Please read through this page in full before progressing to help make your submission the best it can be.
tips: Values: "Hands Off." We want to understand how you will manage everything from development to release.
Confidence: Tell us what you want to make and what sets it apart.
Conciseness: Keep the deck short. Attach deep-dives as separate docs.
pitch.noteText: Note: Crodal and Kowloon specialise in funding premium PC and Console projects. No blockchain/NFTs.
